title: Shapes of progress
creator_credit: John Mallison, Margaret K Johns and Liberatas Films
brief_description: Modern industrial design in Britain. A number if different designers comment on their own work, and explain their individual approach to design. Illustrates how everything that is made has first to be designed, and how the work of designers in the modern world effects everyone.
creator_credit_for_label: John Mallison, Margaret K Johns and Liberatas Films
